channel.title: Pkpoints and funpkpoints wont work

item.title: Pkpoints and funpkpoints wont work
item.dc:creator: @2killsami 2killsami
item.description:
@2killsami wrote:

Hi, iâ€™m trying to make it so when u kill in wild u get pkpoints and when u kill someone in funpk box u get points heres the code but its not working :S

if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPkBox() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) { if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) == true){ client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; killerz.ResetAttack(); if(isinsafewild() == false){ killmessage(); killerz.pkPoints += 2; if(isInPkBox() == true){ killmessage(); killerz.funPoints += 2; if(killerz != null) if(playerRights < 3) if(tradeTimer == 0) youdied();} } } }
